data.title: Isabel Coixet
data.meta_description: Explore the filmography of Isabel Coixet on Rotten Tomatoes! Discover ratings, reviews, and more. Click for details!
data.text:
Highest Rated: 86% Paris, je t'aime (2006)

Lowest Rated: 8% Nobody Wants the Night (2015)

Birthday: Apr 9, 1960

Birthplace: Sant Adrià de Besòs, Spain
